title: Kohli is someone who always tries to improve even when he doesn't score hundreds: MS Dhoni
text: Indian captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni said Virat Kohli paced his knock very well while guiding India to what turned out to be a match-winning total against South Africa in the do-or-die fourth ODI at Chennai Â»
